TITLE: How Elliott Associates' proposal to split two businesses at Western Digital may build value
SUMMARY: The activist investor said Western Digital’s share price may go up if it separates its NAND flash memory business.

SUMMARY: The Luna Foundation Guard has acquired another $1.5 billion in bitcoin for its UST reserve through an OTC sale of luna, its governance token.

SUMMARY: Elon Musk and Cathie Wood took aim at index funds, arguing that passive investments have controlled too big a percentage of the stock market.

SUMMARY: The cost of money is rising for borrowers. So why aren't savers being rewarded?

SUMMARY: Investors who keep their eyes closed for the most harrowing scenes may miss out on bargains.

SUMMARY: Warren Buffett has a long history of deriding investment bankers and their institutions.

SUMMARY: While the pandemic is finally receding in the U.S., Buffett hasn't given the all-clear signal on banks. Why is that?

SUMMARY: The hedge fund industry attracted its largest inflows in seven years during the first quarter as investors sought downside protection amidst a volatility spike.

SUMMARY: Mathieu Chabran sat down with Leslie Picker to discuss the role of alternatives in the region along with his shifting perspective on tech.

SUMMARY: The electric vehicle trade is attracting interest from Wall Street. Invesco's new ETF will give exposure to the metals critical for the energy transition.
